Puzzles.name: Photo Jigsaw
Puzzles.description:
How quickly can you rearrange the jumbled pieces to make 
the original picture?

Puzzles.name: Mubjled Words
Puzzles.description: Can you spot the word in the mixed-up letters?

Puzzles.name: Sum Mix-up
Puzzles.description: It's just very simple arithmetic, but these puzzles are fiendishly difficult!

Puzzles.name: Jig-Maze
Puzzles.description: Is it a maze? Is it a jigsaw? No - it's harder than either!

Puzzles.name: Hidden Words
Puzzles.description: There's a word lurking in that grid of letters - can you find it?

Puzzles.name: Moving Maze
Puzzles.description: Weave past the obstacles to cross the board - but they won't keep still!

Puzzles.name: Missing Letters
Puzzles.description:
You don't need to take many letters out of a word to make it
completely un_nt_ll_g_b_e...

Puzzles.name: Tile Diamonds
Puzzles.description:
Just turn each square round so it matches the ones next to it.
Sounds simple, right?
